DOC.brief_title: AMG 162 ( Denosumab ) Phase 3 Study ( DESIRABLE Study ) Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis Disease-modifying Antirheumatic Drugs ( DMARDs ) Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate inhibitory effect progression , compare placebo , joint destruction AMG 162 administer subcutaneously dose 60 mg every 6 month every 3 month 12 month rheumatoid arthritis patient
